title: High Debt Service Burden
description: In 2023, El Salvador's total debt service reached 82.98% of its exports and 28.83% of its GNI, indicating a significant financial obligation relative to its economic output.

title: Moderate Quality of Business Entry Regulations
description: In 2024, El Salvador scored 62.23 in the quality of regulations for business entry, suggesting room for improvement in facilitating new business ventures.

title: Challenges in Judicial Insolvency Efficiency
description: El Salvador's operational efficiency in resolving judicial insolvency proceedings was rated at 14.25 in 2024, highlighting inefficiencies in handling business insolvency cases.

title: Strong Accessibility in Credit Infrastructure
description: In 2024, El Salvador achieved a high score of 85.28 in the accessibility of information in credit infrastructure, reflecting robust financial services support.
